rooms.name: Living Room & Family Space
rooms.description: Large open space with floor-to-ceiling windows facing the east to harness morning sunlight as per Vastu, complemented by Scandinavian minimalist design.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Modern dining area adjacent to the living room with ample natural light.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional and ergonomic kitchen layout incorporating Scandinavian design elements, ensuring efficient workflow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with private balcony; positioned in the southwest according to Vastu for stability and calm.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom offering serene atmosphere, facing north for clarity.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom maintaining minimalist Scandinavian design, ideally placed in a quiet zone of the apartment.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Auxiliary bedroom with ample natural lighting, aligning with Vastu for balanced energy flow.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: Additional bedroom ensuring privacy and calmness as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 6
rooms.description: Final bedroom that incorporates Scandinavian simplicity and meets local building norms.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom with natural light.

rooms.name: Auxiliary Bathrooms
rooms.description: Multiple auxiliary bathrooms spread across key locations for convenience and adherence to local norms.

openings.description: Stately main entrance door with Scandinavian style detailing and Vastu aligned north-south orientation.
Garage entry providing access to the two-car garage; designed with modern Scandinavian aesthetics and robust local building compliance.
Access point to the swimming pool area with ample natural light and clear line of sight from living room windows.
Service door for utilities and maintenance, adhering to local building codes.

garage.description: Dedicated two-car garage with sufficient space for vehicles and storage, integrating seamlessly into the Scandinavian design.

swimming_pool.description: Modern swimming pool designed to complement the minimalist aesthetics of the apartment and provide recreational space in an open-air setting.

floor_to_ceiling_windows.description: Extensive use of floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light and enhance the Scandinavian aesthetic while respecting Vastu principles.

vastu_considerations.description: Floor plan elements placed in accordance with traditional Vastu Shastra to promote harmony, balance, and positive energy flow.

plot_dimensions.description: The plot is designed to accommodate the single-story Scandinavian design while meeting local zoning regulations.

compliance.description: All design elements have been developed in compliance with local building norms and Vastu principles, ensuring safety, functionality, and aesthetic appeal.
